programme.desc: Sete completos estranhos com caractersticas de personalidade amplamente variadas so involuntariamente colocados em um labirinto sem fim contendo armadilhas mortais.

programme.title: Desastre Solar, (2024, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Trevor e seu colega cientista Nick descobrem que o sol foi empurrado em direo Terra, causando todos os tipos de desastres relacionados a incndios medida que o planeta comea a esquentar rapidamente!

programme.title: Equilibrium, (2002, Thriller)
programme.desc: Num futuro incerto, a raa humana foi quase totalmente devastada da Terra. Para salvar o mundo, os governantes decidiram criar uma droga capaz de inibir o sentimento humano e garantir a paz para sempre.

programme.title: Voo 7500, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Um voo sai dos Estados Unidos para o Japo, durante as dez horas de voo os passageiros pensam em como se distrair ... at perceberem uma presena estranha e sobrenatural dentro do avio.

programme.title: Caadores de Emoo, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Johnny Utah, um jovem agente do FBI, se infiltra em crculos de surf para desmascarar uma gangue de ladres que, como marca registrada, usam mscaras de presidentes dos Estados Unidos durante seus golpes.

programme.title: O Legionrio, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Na Marselha dos anos 20, lutador de boxe vence luta que deveria perder de propsito. Para fugir dos gngsters que buscam vingana, resolve se alistar na Legio Estrangeira, onde enfrenta os horrores da batalha no inspito deserto do Marrocos.

programme.title: Corao de Drago, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial (Jackie Chan) tem a difcil tarefa de cuidar do seu irmo deficiente mental, Sammo. Quando Sammo, acidentalmente se envolve num roubo, ele sequestrado por bandidos e Jackie, tem que salv-lo.

programme.title: Outubro Negro, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Jornalista americano viaja para Israel com o intuito de investigar a morte de oito fuzileiros navais, vtimas de um ataque terrorista. Mas ele acaba descobrindo que muito mais coisas se escondem por trs do incidente e sua vida passa a correr perigo.

programme.title: A Fria do Protetor, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Billy Wong, policial de Nova Iorque que usa artes marciais, investiga com seu parceiro o sequestro de Laura, filha de um milionrio suspeito de ligao com um traficante de Hong Kong.

programme.title: Uma Histria Americana, (1991, Drama)
programme.desc: Duas mulheres, uma negra e uma branca, em 1955 Montgomery Alabama, devem decidir o que faro em resposta ao famoso boicote aos nibus liderado por Martin Luther King.

programme.title: Drages para Sempre, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie contratado para defender uma empresa acusada de poluir as guas da cidade. Ao descobrir que eles produzem drogas, Jackie decide mudar de lado.

programme.title: Crimes de Rua, (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Dois policiais, um com uma arma e outro com os punhos, arriscam tudo para tornar o bairro livre de crimes e drogas, derrubando o mais poderoso chefo das ruas

programme.title: Famlia de Policiais II: Uma Quebra de Confiana, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: O inspetor Paul Fein volta sua antiga vizinhana para desvendar um crime: a mfia russa suspeita de ter assassinado um padre. Desta vez, ele precisa enfrentar fantasmas do passado, sob o risco de ter a sua famlia na mira dos bandidos.

programme.title: Davi, (1997, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: De um simples pastor a um poderoso rei, Davi, com muita coragem e f, comanda o reino de Israel por muitos anos e deixa seu nome na Histria.

programme.title: O Que Fazer?, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: Depois de saber que s tem 90 minutos de vida, por conta de um aneurisma no crebro, um homem infeliz quer fazer as pazes com todos aqueles que foram magoados por ele.

programme.title: Camp (Lio de Vida), (2021, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Aps se inscrever em um programa de monitores de um acampamento filantrpico de vero, um consultor de investimentos tenta ajudar um menino de dez anos de idade a entender o significado do amor incondicional.

programme.title: ltimos Dias no Deserto, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: Durante os 40 dias de jejum e orao no deserto, Jesus luta contra o Diabo pelo destino de uma famlia em crise.

programme.title: Um Anjo em Nossas Vidas, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: Quando um criminoso insensvel e doente cruza o caminho de uma menina cheia de f, uma segunda chance surge para tocar o corao durante a temporada de festas.

programme.title: Prova de Fogo, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: No trabalho o Capito Caleb vive pelo velho ditado dos bombeiros: Nunca deixe o seu companheiro para trs. Em casa, ele vive pelas prprias regras. Agora Caleb ter o seu trabalho mais rduo, resgatar o corao de sua esposa.

programme.title: Carta Para Deus, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: Um menino que luta contra o cncer escreve cartas para Deus, tocando vidas em sua vizinhana e inspirando esperana entre todos com quem entra em contato.

programme.title: A Guerra de Anna, (2019, War Drama)
programme.desc: Uma menina de seis anos chamada Anna tem toda a famlia assassinada em uma execuo em massa de judeus. Por um milagre, ela sobrevive e passa as prximas centenas de dias escondida na chamin em desuso de um comandante nazista.

programme.title: Manabu se revolta quando aprende na escola que vrios animais j foram extintos por causa dos humanos. Logo depois Juunin Makunba, um ninja criminoso e caador de animais em extino, atenta contra a vida de Tetsuzan.

programme.title: Uma menina oferece uma estranha droga a Manabu e acaba deixando-o internado no hospital. Rei, Ryu e Toha investigam quem est por trs da venda desta droga e chegam a Kanin Dragon, um especialista em kung-fu.
programme.desc: Jiraya - O incrvel Ninja

programme.title: Toha encontra Mimura, um ex-adversrio de Tetsuzan e desertor dos ninjas Kaminin. Mimura est sendo perseguido pelo cl pois no quer cometer os crimes que os Kaminin praticam. Ele ento pede ajuda famlia Yamashi.

programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: Masao presencia um acidente envolvendo soldados do Imprio Crisis e eles deixam cair um controle remoto em formato de teclado que possui habilidades ocultas. Pessoas comeam a ter a aparncia modificada uma atrs da outra e Issamu estuda o caso.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: O Raimon subiu de nvel durante o treinamento de snowboard e est pronto para enfrentar a Aliea Academy mais uma vez. Mas eles tm o que preciso para venc-los? E mesmo se o fizerem, o que mais a Aliea Academy tem reservado.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Kazekage Se Mantm No Alto

programme.desc: Gaara, totalmente sem foras, arrastado paralonge por deidara. Kankuro ignora esforos de baki de parar deidara e sai imediatamente em perseguio com um peloto para salvar gaara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Equipe Kakashi Se Mobiliza
programme.desc: A caminho da aldeia da areia, temari encontra kakashi e sua equipe. Kakashi chama naruto quando ele tenta seguir adiante e naruto explode sua raiva pelos akatsuki.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Lagrimas Do Jinchuriki
programme.desc: Uma mensagem urgente da aldeia da areia informando o sequestro do kazekage pelos akatsuki chega aldeia da folha. Tsunade no perde tempo em mandar a equipe kakashi para a aldeia da areia. Enquanto isso, kankuro comea a sua batalha contra os akatsuki.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Jutsu De Selamento: Nove Drages Fantasmas!
programme.desc: Os ninjas da areia lutam contra o tempo para salvar kankuro,at queumaperitaem veneno da areia, vov chiyo chamada.a nica esperana est nos reforos enviados por tsunade. Mas naruto, sakura e kakashi so atrasados por uma tempestade de areia.
programme.sub-title: Jutsu De Selamento: Nove Drages Fantasmas!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Aprendiz De Mdica Ninja
programme.desc: Sakura trata kankuro que est gravemente enfermo. Aps um extenso treinamento, Sakura se tornou um incrvel mdica ninja e deixa todos espantados com suas mos firmes.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Determinao Da Vov Aposentada
programme.desc: Pakkun acha o esconderijo dos akatsuki. A equipe kakashi e temari se preparam para resgatar, mas temari recebe ordens para ficar e ajudar a proteger a aldeia. Vov chiyo se oferece para tomar o lugar de temari.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Encontro Com Destino
programme.desc: A equipe kakashi encontra itachi uchiha, de quem sofrera uma amarga derrota no passado. Kakashi diz a todos para no olharem nos olhos sharingan de itachi. Kakashi se prepara para enfrentar itachi sozinho e pede que naruto d cobertura.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Crescimento De Naruto
programme.desc: Guy lamenta sua asneira ao ver seus trs alunos presos pela priso de gua.determinado a parar kisame, guy o desafia usando o nunchaku, sua arma favorita. um super taijutsu contra uma super fora humana.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Esfera Secreta De Chama
programme.desc: Vov chiyo e sakura salvam naruto do genjutsu de itachi.no mesmo instante, kakashi comea um contra-ataque. Uma batalha ninja de nvel alto comea e kakashi exibe toda sua destreza e percio usando uma ttica sutil.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Segredo Do Jinchurik!
programme.desc: Seus inimigos derrotados, kisame e itachi, parecem ter sido clones, cujos poderes e aparecimento foram copiados por um jutsu de personificao.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Morte Do Gaara
programme.desc: As equipes kakashi e guy fazem uma pausa.vov chiyo observa naruto cochilar e lembra de sasori quando criana.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Postura Ttica: Operao Entrada Em Gancho!
programme.desc: As equipe kakashi e guy chegam ao esconderijo dos akatsuki. Eles correm para se infiltrar mas so parados por uma barreira de cinco selos. O nico jeito de quebrar a barreira removendo os cinco selos de uma s vez.
programme.sub-title: Postura Ttica: Operao Entrada Em Gancho!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Armadilhas Ativadas ... Os Inimigos Da Equipe Guy!
programme.desc: Quebrar a barreira de cinco selos ativa uma armadilha, e agora a equipe guy enfrentam cpias idnticas de si mesmos numa batalha.no esconderijo dos akatsuki, deidara e sasori lutam para se apoderar do jinchuriki de nove caudas.
programme.sub-title: Armadilhas Ativadas ... Os Inimigos Da Equipe Guy!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Hiruko Contra Duas Kunoichi!
programme.desc: Finalmente a luta entre av e neto comea. Sakura fica confusa com a aparncia estranha de sasori, e vov chiyo explica que aquele hiruko, o corpo que sasori usa para autodefesa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Verdadeiro Rosto De Sasori
programme.desc: Vovchiyo e sakura conseguem expor sasori, que incrivelmente no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos.chiyo fica ainda mais chocada com o segundo boneco que sasori revela.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Habilidades Secretas De Chiyo
programme.desc: Sakura pega pelas tticas de sasori e fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno. Mas ela usa uma papel bomba para se livrar da fumaavenenosa. Ela resolver se arriscar a capturar sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre o paradeiro de orochimaru.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pai E Me
programme.desc: A maior vantagem dos bonecos criados de humanos que ele pode assumir o comando do jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo.consequentemente, o boneco do terceiro kazekage tem ahabilidade especial de converter chakra em poder magntico.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Terceiro Kazekage
programme.desc: Sakura revida oataque da areia de ferro do boneco do terceiro kazekage com uma fora sobre-humana. Ela aprendeu com tsunade que a habilidade mais importante de um mdico ninja se evadir um ataque.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Trs Minutos Entre A Vida E A Morte
programme.desc: Sakura destri o boneco do terceiro kazekage graas a um antdoto secreto que ela tomou. Sakura explica a uma surpresa vov chiyo que esse antdoto converte o veneno em protena e funciona durante mais ou menos trs minutos.
programme.sub-title: Trs Minutos Entre A Vida E A Morte

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Luta Entre Marionetes: Dez Contra Cem!
programme.desc: Sakura e vov chiyo esto enfrentando uma batalha feroz contra sasori, onde ele pode se tornar um boneco humano. Elas derrotam sasori dentro do prazo, mas ele acaba revivendo.
programme.sub-title: Luta Entre Marionetes: Dez Contra Cem!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Sonho Impossvel
programme.desc: Embora tenha sido envenenada, vov chiyo usa o ltimoantdoto em sakura. Zombando da terna cena entre vov chiyo e sakura, sasori tenta por fim vida de vov chiyo. Mas vov chiyo revida e derrota sasori.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Feras Ressuscitadas!
programme.desc: Os ninjas da equipe guy se preocupam com o resultado da luta desesperada de sakura e vov chiyo, enquanto enfrentam suas cpias.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Kakashi Iluminado
programme.desc: Sakura corre para achar naruto com a vov chiyo, que est sofrendo com o veneno. Os membros da equipe guy correm paraajudar a equipe kakashi. Enquanto isso, com as preparaes completas, kakashi revela seu mangekyo sharingan.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Esttica De Um Momento
programme.desc: Na Aldeia da Folha, a equipe de Konohamaru foi promovida a Genin e agora est sob a superviso de Ebisu. Um Naruto mais velho chega aldeia aps uma longa jornada de treinamento com Jiraiya. Naruto Uzumaki est de volta!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Legado
programme.desc: Jiraiya traz notcias altamente secretas de que os Akatsuki entraram em ao. Naruto e Sakura propem a Kakashi um desafio de sobrevivncia. Na Aldeia da Areia, Gaara o Kazekage agora, e membros da Akatsuki se infiltram na aldeia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Volta Do Kazekage
programme.desc: As habilidades de Naruto e Sakura foram Kakashi a usar seu sharingan imediatamente. Naruto lana um jutsu aps outro. Sakura usa tcnicas ensinadas a ela por Tsunade. Deidara da Akatsuki comea uma operao secreta para se infiltrar na Aldeia da Areia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Alvo
programme.desc: Gaara percebe a presena de Deidara e comea uma batalha area na areia. O jonin da areia Yura, um agente da Akatsuki, e a Aldeia da Areia sofre danos. Na Aldeia da Folha, Naruto e Sakura veem o incrvel poder de Kakashi. A dupla d seu golpe final.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Formao! A Nova Equipe Kakashi
programme.desc: Naruto e Sakura derrotam Kakashi. Tsunade os nomeia como uma equipe de trs liderados por Kakashi, dizendo que agora so todos iguais. Gaara e Deidara continuam sua batalha. Baki fica preocupado que o shukaku se materialize, mas Kankuro ri da ideia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Adio Indesejada
programme.desc: Para proteger sua aldeia da argila explosiva de Deidara, Gaara usa seu chakra para criar um escudo. A aldeia salva a um enorme custo. Gaara fica vulnervel. As tentativas de seus companheiros so inteis, e Gaara acaba caindo nas mos de Deidara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Falso Sorriso
programme.desc: Gaara arrastado para longe por Deidara. Kankuro sai com um peloto para salvar Gaara, mas os Akatsuki haviam instalado armadilhas engenhosas. Determinado, Kankuro encontra sozinho os Akatsuki. A nova equipe de Naruto comemora sua primeira misso.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sem Ttulo
programme.desc: Temari encontra Kakashi e sua equipe. Naruto explode de raiva pelos Akatsuki. Como tambm hospeda uma besta de cauda dentro de si, Naruto entende o que Gaara est sofrendo. Kankuro infectado por um veneno. Sem um antdoto, ele ter poucos dias de vida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Simulao

programme.title: Texas Chainsaw, (1970, Horror Classics)

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Justice Part 2
programme.desc: Polnareff realizes that Enyaba is a new assassin sent by DIO. He is prevented from warning his comrades by Enyaba's Stand "Justice," which has the ability to control corpses.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Lovers Part 1
programme.desc: After surviving Enyaba's attack, Jotaro and crew make it to Pakistan's capital, Karachi. There, they encounter DIO's next assassin, Dan of Steel.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Lovers Part 2
programme.desc: Dan of Steel's Stand, "The Lovers," has entered Joseph's brain. With Joseph's life on the line, Jotaro has no choice but to carry out Dan's orders, but the rest of his companions have their own say in the matter.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Sun
programme.desc: Jotaro and his fellows take camels and travel across the desert, headed for Cairo. Along the way, though, they can't shake the sensation that someone or something is watching their every move.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Death 13, Part 1
programme.desc: Kakyoin dreams about being in a strange amusement park, where he encounters the Death tarot card. While in the dream he witnesses Death cut down a dog, but after waking up in terror he can't remember what the nightmare was about.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Death 13, Part 2
programme.desc: Kakyoin tries to convince the others that the baby is a Stand user, but they merely start to doubt his sanity. Unable to persuade his friends, Kakyoin resorts to some extreme measures.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Judgment, Part 1
programme.desc: Jotaro and the team visit an island in the Red Sea and find Avdol's father, renewing the grief Polnareff felt over his friend's death. But perhaps there is a way he can right that wrong. Or not.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Judgment, Part 2
programme.desc: Polnareff revives his sister Shelly using one of his three wishes but is then attacked by her. The enemy Stand user, Cameo, then says he'll grant Polnareff's last wish and revives Avdol.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The High Priestess, Part 1
programme.desc: Jotaro and the others obtain a submarine as a new means of transport, but as they travel through the Red Sea they realize that there are few places to escape to should danger arise underwater.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The High Priestess, Part 2
programme.desc: The team attempts to escape the submarine with scuba gear as it sinks under attacks from the shape-changing enemy Stand "High Priestess."

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: After receiving instructions from their leader, Chrollo, the Phantom Troupe converges in the city.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon, Killua and Leorio start gathering funds in order to bid on the game "Greed Island."

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The Phantom Troupe takes over the auction site and the merchandise disappears without a trace, along with the guests.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The Mafia's secret weapon, the Shadow Beasts, set out to annihilate the Phantom Troupe.
programme.sub-title: Buildup x To A x Fierce Battle!

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Kurapika has captured a member of the Phantom Troupe.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Kurapika sends the Boss away to safety, and then waits to confront the Phantom Troupe alone.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Kurapika comes face to face with Uvogin.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: At the antiques market, Gon discovers a foolproof way to appraise valuable items.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon and the others plan to raise the money they need by collecting the bounties placed on the Troupe.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The Phantom Troupe captures Gon and Killua.

programme.title: Death Note: Performance
programme.desc: The Yotsuba Group hires Eraldo Coil to uncover L's identity.

programme.title: Death Note: Guidance
programme.desc: Misa succeeds in narrowing down the Kira suspects in the Yotsuba Group to one: Higuchi.

programme.title: Death Note: Frenzy
programme.desc: Higuchi of the Yotsuba Group attempts to kill Matsuda of the task force, and is surprised when he doesn't die after 40 seconds.

programme.title: Death Note: Revival
programme.desc: Higuchi is captured and tells the investigators about the Death Note.

programme.title: Death Note: Silence
programme.desc: Light, his memory recovered, orders Misa to begin killing after Higuchi dies.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: July 15th (Thurs), Part 3
programme.desc: Rohan finds himself possessed by Masazo Kinotos Stand, Cheap Trap, who tells the manga artist to burn the photos he took of the people in Morioh. Meanwhile, Josuke and Yuya encounter the Stand user responsible for Koichis disappearance.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: July 15th (Thurs), Part 4
programme.desc: Rohan calls over Koichi to help him fight off Cheap Trap, which has attached itself onto Rohans back. Unfortunately, Koichi thinks Rohan is pulling a prank on him and leaves.

programme.desc: Kosaku Kawajiri is forced to kill Hayato after the boy threatens to expose him as a killer. To make matter worse, Kosaku learns from his father, Yoshihiro, that Rohan and the others are coming to investigate the Kawajiri family shortly.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Bites the Dust, Part 2
programme.desc: Yoshikage Kira gains a new ability called Bites the Dust, a bomb that automatically kills anyone who tries to discover Kiras identity through Hayato. Realizing that the only people who could stop Kira are ones with similar powers.

programme.desc: Hayatos attempt to kill Kira using Stray Cats air bullet ends in failure. Kira realizes that letting Hayato repeat the same morning is becoming a risk, so he decides to undo Bites the Dust after he sees through Rohans death.

programme.desc: Josuke and Hayato hide inside a nearby residence to escape from Deadly Queen and Stray Cats attack. But to their horror, Kira is somehow able to close in on them from outside the house.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Goodbye, Morioh The Heart of Gold
programme.desc: Josuke and his friends have finally cornered Yoshikage Kira. Refusing to give up, Kira tries to activate Bites the Dust one more time to escape his desperate situation. Can Josuke and the others stop Kira in time to save the future of Morioh?
programme.sub-title: Goodbye, Morioh The Heart of Gold

programme.desc: In a modern America where witchcraft is illegal, a sheltered teenager must face her own prejudices to help two witches evade execution and reach asylum in Mexico.

programme.title: Day of the Dead, (2008, Zombies)
programme.desc: When a Colorado town is overrun by the flesh-hungry dead, a small group of survivors tries to escape in a last-ditch effort to stay alive. With Mena Suvari ('American Beauty'), AnnaLynne McCord ('Excision').

programme.title: Let The Right One In, (2008, Foreign Horror)
programme.desc: Lonely, 12-year-old Oskar is bullied by his classmates. A new friendship develops when Eli, a pale young girl who only comes out at night, moves in next door. Coinciding with her arrival is a series of inexplicable disappearances and murders.

programme.title: Anna And The Apocalypse, (2018, Zombies)
programme.desc: In this gleeful mashup, Anna and her friends must fight and sing their way through a zombie invasion to reach the supposed safety of their school, not knowing if their parents and friends will still be alive when they get there.

programme.title: George A. Romero's Survival of the Dead, (2010, Zombies)
programme.desc: The final film from George A. Romero (legendary creator of the Night of the Living Dead franchise) picks up where Diary of the Dead leaves off - in a nightmarish world where humans are the minority and the zombies rule.

programme.title: Evil Dead II, (1987, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Ash, the sole survivor of THE EVIL DEAD, returns to the same cabin in the woods and again unleashes the dead. With his girlfriend possessed and his body parts running amok, Ash must again single-handedly battle the damned in this unhinged horror classic!

programme.title: Bubba Ho-Tep, (2002, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Switching with an impersonator before his "death" and missing his chance to switch back, Elvis ends up at a nursing home in Texas. With a resident who thinks he's JFK, Elvis must battle evil who has chosen their care facility as his hunting grounds.

programme.title: Raging Bull, (2020, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: RAGING BULL is director Martin Scorsese's lacerating film biography of middleweight boxing champion Jake LaMotta, who was known during his brief reign as "the Bronx Bull."

programme.title: Mississippi Burning, (1988, Crime)

programme.title: Urban Cowboy, (1980, Drama)

programme.title: Thief, (1981, Crime)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are unconscious, leaving him to defeat Alexander the Great on his own!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa found the Millennium Puzzle decades ago, but little is known about the terrors, traps, turmoil, and treachery he faced to find the ancient artifact! See how it all began as we learn how Grandpa unearthed the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The evil spirit within the Millennium Ring has reunited with Bakura, prepped with a new monster to create the ultimate Shadow Game. And his first target is Kaiba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends go to the dawn of the duel, to the place where it all began, to the land where the Pharaoh's mysteries lie: Egypt.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The past is quickly becoming perilous as the fearless bandit king Bakura has invaded the Pharaoh's palace to take down the keepers of the seven Millennium Items single-handedly!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Even with the potent power of Obelisk the Tormentor, the Pharaoh couldn't prevent the bandit Bakura from escaping. Everyone knows that thief will return for a rematch, so Seto has a plan to create a powerful army.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad vows to stop the bandit king Bakura's sneak attacks once and for all, but he may have made a promise he can't keep!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad, the first of the Pharaoh's guardians, has fallen. Even worse, the bandit king Bakura now has the Millennium Ring, making his Diabound even more unstoppable!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origins of the Millennium Items are revealed! Who forged these powerful artifacts, and why were they created? Though the Millennium Items are powerful, such power comes with a heavy price... a debt that may never be able to be repaid!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh calls forth the mighty Egyptian God Slifer the Sky Dragon to fight the bandit Bakura's Diabound, but when Diabound starts attacking the townspeople, the Pharaoh must protect them, even if it means sacrificing himself!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The bandit Bakura has stolen the Millennium Puzzle and sent the Pharaoh plummeting into the abyss. Now he's another step closer to obtaining all seven Millennium Items and resurrecting the malevolent Zorc, the greatest evil of all time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the Pharaoh are reunited, but the Pharaoh is powerless without the Millennium Puzzle! However, that won't stop the Pharaoh from a final showdown against the bandit king Bakura.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the showdown in the sands between the bandit Bakura and his ever-growing Diabound versus the Pharaoh, Mahad the Dark Magician, and the remaining guardians of the Pharaoh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With the help of his father's spirit, the Pharaoh and his guardians defeated the bandit Bakura's Diabound and stopped the horrible Zorc from resurrecting... or did they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh's journey was more than a trip to the past, it's the greatest Shadow Game ever created. Yami Yugi and Yami Bakura's Shadow Game has already reached apocalyptic proportions, but it's only the beginning of cataclysmic events!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zorc's incredible shadow energies have resurrected the bandit Bakura and his Diabound. With a second chance at revenge, the bandit king has broken up the Pharaoh's team so that he can divide and conquer them one at a time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The hope of mankind rests on Yugi's shoulders as he arrives at the final temple chamber where the Pharaoh's name is located, but something unexpected is waiting for them - a sinister surprise that can cost them their lives!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After a nearly eternal slumber, the all-powerful Zorc has resurrected, plunging the world into darkness!

programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc. The Pharaoh desperately wants to summon the three Egyptian Gods, but he can't without his Millennium Puzzle!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Exodia the Forbidden One couldn't defeat Zorc! Exodia was able to buy enough time for the Pharaoh to get his Millennium Puzzle back-he can now summon the almighty Egyptian Gods! It's time for the Pharaoh's counterattack in the biggest brawl.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part III

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated. The Pharaoh is severely hurt and unable to stop Zorc from setting fire to the city, but our heroes aren't giving up. It's not double vision when Seto and Kaiba transcend time to confront Zorc.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part IV

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and Kaiba's combined strength couldn't defeat Zorc. Yugi must give the Pharaoh his name, but Yugi doesn't know how to read ancient Egyptian text. All bets are off in the final clash where Yugi must protect the past to save the future!
programme.sub-title: In the Name of the Pharaoh

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pharaoh Atem, Yugi, and friends have defeated the bandit Bakura and Zorc, but the final test still awaits! Yugi must duel Atem! As they set sail to the final dueling grounds, everyone realizes this may be the final night Yugi and Atem have together.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi defeats Atem, Yugi will prove he's ready to stand on his own, and Atem can join his friends in the world beyond. But Yugi and Atem will be separated forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods! What chance does Yugi have against these powerful creatures that no one has been able to defeat? Yugi better think of a strategy quickly or this duel will be over soon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem still has all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn't have a single monster on the field! Yugi claims that he has a combo that will defeat the Egyptian Gods, but is he simply bragging, or does he actually have a plan?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem - more than friends, closer than brothers. Will they stay together, or is it time to say goodbye? It's the final answer, the final duel, and the final time we will see our friends in the rousing conclusion to Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: A mysterious force that resembles Cavendish menaces the battlefield - but while it appears to help Bartolomeo and the others at first, it sets its sights on Robin! Meanwhile, the deeply-wounded Ideo sees Dellinger's horrible true nature!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Strong Wind and a Surge! Hakuba vs. Dellinger!

programme.title: Bartolomeo is in a neck-and-neck battle against Gladius to save Robin, and is faced with an impossible dilemma. With all his options leading to their defeat, can his cunning ploy save the day? Meanwhile, Robin is face to face with Cavendish.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Princess Mansherry's amazing power - to heal living beings completely - is in the hands of the Donquixote executive. If she is able to heal all the executives who've gone down in battle - the Straw Hats and their allies stand no chance!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Seor Pink and Franky continue their knock-down, drag-out, manly fight. As both of them are pushed to their limits, we learn Seor's tragic past! Meanwhile, Princess Mansherry's rescue hits a snag as she stubbornly refuses to leave!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Manly Duel! Seor's Elegy of Love!

programme.title: Franky and Seor Pink end their harrowing duel in a manly way - but victory knocks the wind out of even the winner's sails! Meanwhile, Diamante and Kyros struggle desperately on the Sunflower Field, each demonstrating their extreme prowess.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Stardust of Death! Diamante's Storm of Vicious Attacks!

programme.title: Kyros, unbowed by Diamante's vicious attacks, fights back with the anger and retribution of all of Dressrosa in order to fulfill his promise to protect Rebecca. If he is successful, only a few executives will remain.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Pica loses his temper and turns his full wrath against King Riku, whom he hopes to destroy, ending the revolution against Doflamingo. Meanwhile, Zoro, who has been distracted by Pica and drawn far from the battle, has to hatch a plan to save the king!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Moving Across the Ground! The Giant Statue Pica's Surprise Maneuver!

programme.title: With the lives of King Riku, Usopp, and the others on the old King's Plateau in the balance, Zoro must dig deep and discover a powerful technique to counter Pica's near-unstoppable onslaught. Meanwhile, King Riku ponders what it means to be a good king.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Decisive Battle in Midair! Zoro's New Special Secret Technique Blasts!

programme.title: Zoro finishes off Pica, and those below his crumbling body rush to find shelter. Meanwhile, the Tontattas finish up demolishing the SMILE Factory, and Luffy's hand is forced in his duel with Bellamy!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Taking down Bellamy only enrages Luffy in his fight against Doflamingo, his anger multiplying when he finds Law's lifeless body! Meanwhile, Doflamingo takes the next step to end the game he started, which will endanger everybody in Dressrosa!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The Birdcage draws tighter and tighter around Dressrosa, threatening to destroy all life on the island kingdom! Meanwhile, Doflamingo stands down Luffy for a final confrontation, but a surprising twist shocks everyone on the top of the Royal Palace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Blade of Tenacity! The Gamma Knife Counterattack!

programme.title: Law's attack proves powerful - but Doflamingo's power has depths which he and Luffy haven't bargained for. When Doflamingo makes his counterattack, Luffy stares him down with an amazing power.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Collision of Haki! Luffy vs. Doflamingo!

programme.title: Trebol's wrath is fully inflamed as Law summons enough energy to speak, denouncing the Doflamingo Family executives as pawns in Doflamingo's game. But Law gathers enough energy to do more than just speak out.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Unassailable! The Stunning Secret of Trebol!

programme.title: Cavendish has to make a difficult decision when the severely wounded Law begs him to be left behind. Meanwhile, seeing even his Second Gear or Third Gear attacks aren't working against Doflamingo, Luffy decides to use his ultimate technique!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Anger Erupts! I Will Take Everything upon Myself!

programme.title: Luffy and Doflamingo duke it out while the Birdcage tightens its grip on Dressrosa! Zoro sets off with a plan to stop it from slicing apart the country, while Luffy's Fourth Gear proves quite potent against Doflamingo!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The Birdcage continues its merciless constriction, sending the residents of Dressrosa fleeing towards the center of the island, while King Riku calls out to his people: Survive long enough for Luffy to vanquish the last of the royal family.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Fourth Gear gives Luffy the power he needs to head off Doflamingo at every strike! But the energy required to keep Fourth Gear going starts to take a toll on Luffy. Will he have enough left to finish the job?
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Bounce-man's power has drained Luffy, leaving him in need of a rest before he can reuse his Haki, but luckily the gladiators from the Colosseum have come around and are focusing on taking down Doflamingo! Sabo steps in at a crucial moment.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Flame Dragon King! Protect Luffy's Life!

programme.title: With Luffy and so many of the Straw Hats' allies incapacitated, victory seems inevitable for Doflamingo - but the compassion of Mansherry may be enough to turn the tide and renew their hope - to stop the Birdcage!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: With just over a minute to spare, everyone in Dressrosa turns their efforts towards slowing down the Birdcage as it squeezes the life out of the country! Meanwhile, Viola seeks Doflamingo out herself, for a shocking confrontation!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: As Long as We Breathe! Stop the Deadly Birdcage!

programme.title: Only a bit more time remains before Luffy returns to the scene! But as time slips by, those who had been roused by Princess Mansherry's powers begin to falter! Meanwhile, Rebecca, under the control of Doflamingo, is about to attack Viola!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dead or Alive! A Fateful Countdown!

programme.title: Luffy regains enough Haki to face off against Doflamingo, but his health is still poor. With the Birdcage closing in, is there a technique left in his repertoire that is strong enough to take down Doflamingo?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Attack on a Celestial! Luffy's King Kong Gun of Anger!

programme.title: With Doflamingo thoroughly quashed and the Birdcage collapsing, the people of Dressrosa shed tears of joy remembering the hardships they've endured, and the actions taken by Luffy and the others to free them.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Jesus Burgess of the Blackbeard Pirates tries to agitate Sabo, mocking Ace's final words in order to unsettle him enough that he can try to steal the Flare-Flare Fruit! Meanwhile, people of Dressrosa beg King Riku to resume the crown.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Unheard-of! Admiral Fujitoras Surprising Decision!

programme.title: Repercussions of Doflamingo's defeat reverberate around the world! Fujitora's actions put the Navy in a tight spot, and the "Worst Generation" beings to stir into action!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sending a Shock Wave! The Worst Generation Goes Into Action!

programme.title: The combatants in the battle for Dressrosa can finally begin to recoup, but those who stay awake are treated to the story of how Sabo joined the Revolutionary Army!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Birth of the Legend! The Adventures of the Revolutionary Warrior Sabo!

programme.title: Sabo recounts his surprising reunion with Luffy at the Colosseum as the Straw Hats and the others continue to recoup. Meanwhile, Fujitora gambles on how to make his next move - and the odds are in Luffy's favor!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Brothers' Bond! The Untold Story Behind Luffy and Sabo's Reunion!

programme.title: As Sabo departs, our attention shifts to the other Straw Hats waging a fierce battle on a mysterious island. And a new drama is set into motion as ill portents fall from the sky!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Strongest Creature! One of the Four Emperors - Kaido, King of the Beasts!

programme.title: As Luffy and the others begin to come to their senses, major players in the Navy arrive to search Dressrosa for the Straw Hats! Also, Rebecca's history is whitewashed with a fake cover story - but why?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fujitora Takes Action! The Complete Siege of the Straw Hats!

programme.title: Brotherhood of the Wolf, (2001, Foreign Action & Adventure)
programme.desc: In 18th-century France, the Chevalier de Fronsac and his Native American friend Mani are sent to the Gevaudan province at the king's behest to investigate the killings of hundreds by a mysterious beast.

programme.title: Cyborg, (1989, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi thriller as Gibson Rickenbacker, the future's most fearsome warrior. In the wake of a plague, Rickenbacker must rescue the only person who can develop a vaccine and save civilization.

programme.title: Annihilation, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A biologist and former solider (Natalie Portman) must lead a mission into a mysterious quarantine zone known as The Shimmer, a beautiful but deadly world of mutated landscapes and creatures that threatens all life on Earth. Also starring Oscar Isaac.

programme.title: Infinite, (2021, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Evan McCauley has skills he never learned and memories of places he has never visited. Self-medicated and on the brink of a mental breakdown, a secret group that call themselves Infinites come to his rescue, revealing that his memories are real.

programme.title: Criminal, (2016, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: The memories and skills of a deceased CIA agent are implanted into an unpredictable and dangerous convict in order to complete the agent's final assignment.

programme.title: Annihilation, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A biologist and former solider (Natalie Portman) must lead a mission into a mysterious quarantine zone known as The Shimmer, a beautiful but deadly world of mutated landscapes and creatures that threatens all life on Earth. Also starring Oscar Isaac.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Minority Report, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the future, a division of the police department has the technology to arrest killers before they commit crimes; however, the tables turn on one of the cops working within the division.

programme.title: War of the Worlds, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A contemporary retelling of H.G.Wells' classic, the sci-fi thriller reveals the extraordinary battle for the future of humankind through the eyes of one American family.

programme.title: The Old Barn Dance, (1938, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry and Frog Millhouse are horse traders who run into trouble when an unscrupulous tractor company starts selling the modern machines to farmers.

programme.title: Blue Montana Skies, (1939, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry heads North to apprehend fur smugglers plundering the trappers' pelts, and then return to the U.S. When the trail leads to the H-H dude ranch owned by a beautiful gal, the action heats up.

programme.title: Home on the Prairie, (1939, Drama)
programme.desc: Livestock inspectors Gene Autry and Frog Millhouse are accused of favoritism when they try to help an old rancher and his attractive daughter whose cattle appear have hoof and mouth disease and are doomed to be destroyed.

programme.title: Return of Sabata, (1971, Drama)
programme.desc: The great Lee Van Cleef ('Death Rides a Horse') returns as the famous freewheeling gunslinger Sabata. In this third and final go-round for the enigmatic sharpshooter, Sabata seeks revenge when a band of desperadoes bilks him out of $5,000.

programme.title: Five Guns To Tombstone, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: A reformed outlaw is living a clean life until his no-good brother who just escaped from prison ropes him into pulling a robbery. Now Billy has his own plan...to prevent it. And all he needs is his six shooters and a little luck.

programme.title: From Noon Till Three, (1976, Western)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson plays Graham Dorsey, a bank robber who, through a series of twists and turns finds himself the object of national adoration. A beautiful widow, Amanda Starbuck (Jill Ireland) is responsible for creating this myth.

programme.title: Breakheart Pass, (1975, Drama)
programme.desc: As a train races through the Rocky Mountains, the passengers are being murdered! The only hope is John Deakin (Charles Bronson) who uncovers a secret that explodes in a torrent of shocking revelations, explosive brawls, and blazing gun battles.

programme.title: The White Buffalo, (1977, Western)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson and Will Sampson star as Wild Bill Hickok and Chief Crazy Horse in this one-of-a-kind western that finds both western legends braving the snowy wilderness in search of the demon that haunts them both, the fabled White Buffalo!

programme.title: Last Train From Gun Hill, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: Screen giants Kirk Douglas and Anthony Quinn star in this taut Western thriller directed by acclaimed filmmaker John Sturges (Gunfight at the O.K. Corral, The Great Escape).

programme.title: The Sons of Katie Elder, (1965, Drama)
programme.desc: The four rowdy sons of Katie Elder return home for her funeral and to avenge her death.

programme.title: Chicago, (2002, Musical)
programme.desc: Winner of 6 Academy Awards, including Best Picture, and based on the hit Broadway musical, Chicago is a dazzling spectacle cheered by audiences and critics alike, where crimes of passion make way for legends to those seeking the spotlight.

programme.title: Shall We Dance?, (2004, Drama)
programme.desc: John Clark is a meek workaholic who feels trapped in a dull, mind-numbing existence. One night, his whole life changes after the sight of a beautiful dance instructor inspire him to break out of his mold and sign up for some fancy footwork.

programme.title: BrideandPrejudice, (2005, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Based on Jane Austen's classic novel Pride And Prejudice, with a musical twist, sparks fly, and cultures clash between a small-town beauty and a wealthy American. An acclaimed treat from director Gurinder Chadha.

programme.title: Chicago, (2002, Musical)
programme.desc: Winner of 6 Academy Awards, including Best Picture, and based on the hit Broadway musical, Chicago is a dazzling spectacle cheered by audiences and critics alike, where crimes of passion make way for legends to those seeking the spotlight.

programme.title: Shall We Dance?, (2004, Drama)
programme.desc: John Clark is a meek workaholic who feels trapped in a dull, mind-numbing existence. One night, his whole life changes after the sight of a beautiful dance instructor inspire him to break out of his mold and sign up for some fancy footwork.

programme.title: BrideandPrejudice, (2005, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Based on Jane Austen's classic novel Pride And Prejudice, with a musical twist, sparks fly, and cultures clash between a small-town beauty and a wealthy American. An acclaimed treat from director Gurinder Chadha.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Diary, (2004, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Single girl Bridget Jones decides to turn over a new page in her life, channeling her thoughts, opinions, and insecurities into a diary. It's instead a hilarious chronicle of her adventures in this modern-romance classic based on the bestseller.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days, (2003, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A "How to..." columnist agrees to write a first-hand account about what it takes to drive a man out of your life... in exactly 10 days.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami and Makoto are trying to figure out who the Moonlight Knight is. Makoto volunteers to investigate by getting closer to Seijuro.
programme.sub-title: Is Seijuro the Moonlight Knight? Mako on Fire

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the girls get into an argument over who gets to play Snow White in the upcoming play with Mamoru.
programme.sub-title: Steal a Kiss from Mamoru: An's Project Snow White

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Natsumi both get detention after angering Ms. Haruna during class. The two start working on their assignment when a Cardian shows up.
programme.sub-title: After-School Trouble: Usagi Is a Target

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ail and An learn that the Makai Tree is beginning to die. Usagi and her friends visit Natsumi after hearing that Natsumi is not feeling well.
programme.sub-title: Disconnecting Love: The Raging Makai Tree

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: While visiting Seijuro and Natsumi's apartment, Usagi and Mamoru come under attack by the Makai Tree.
programme.sub-title: True Love Awakens: The Makai Tree's Secret

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A mysterious girl suddenly falls down from the sky. Calling herself 'Usagi,' the girl demands Usagi to tell her where the Silver Crystal is.
programme.sub-title: Angel or Devil? The Mysterious Girl from the Sky

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi wakes up to find that Chibi-Usa has gone missing. Meeting up with Mamoru, the two search for Chibi-Usa, finding her alone at the park.
programme.sub-title: Usagi Devastated: Mamoru Declares a Break-Up

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami is offered a chance to study abroad in Germany. Knowing how important this is to her, Usagi and the others urge Ami to accept the offer.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rei's grandfather is upset that Hikawa Shrine has had fewer female visitors lately. He then decides to retire as head priest to start a new business.
programme.sub-title: Women Must Be Strong and Beautiful: Rei's New Special Technique

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rubeus sends down Petz and her Droid to search and capture Chibi-Usa. Chibi-Usa is calling someone telling her she wants to go home.
programme.sub-title: In Search of the Silver Crystal: Chibi-Usa's Secret

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako and Makoto clash over their opposing views on love. Usagi takes the girls to a accessory shop, unaware that Petz and Calaveras run the place.
programme.sub-title: Dispute Over Love: Minako and Makoto's Conflict

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa's class is having a parent-child curry party. After hearing that neither Kenji nor Ikuko can attend, Usagi decides to go in their place.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Parental Love: The Curry Romance Triangle

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls enjoy some vacation time on an island. Chibi-Usa and Rei get into a small fight, causing an angry Chibi-Usa to go out to the sea alone.
programme.sub-title: The Beach, the Island and a Vacation: The Guardians' Break

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa leaves the house after being scolded by Usagi. Chibi-Usa begins to cry, which draws the attention of Rubeus and the Four Spectre Sisters.
programme.sub-title: Protect Chibi-Usa: Clash of the Ten Warriors

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Mamoru has a dream which a voice warns him that being with Usagi will bring her great misfortune. Meanwhile, Sailor Moon is attacked by a Droid.
programme.sub-title: Awaken the Sleeping Beauty: Mamoru's Distress

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Wiseman predicts that Chibi-Usa will appear at Hikawa Shrine. Learning of this, Rubeus orders Koan to go down there and eliminate their target.
programme.sub-title: Battle of the Flames of Love! Mars vs. Koan

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami enters the World Chess Tournament, but Bertheir is also there, forcing Ami to transform and reveal her identity as a Sailor Guardian to the enemy.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rubeus gives Petz and Calaveras one last chance to eliminate Rabbit and the Sailor Guardians once and for all.
programme.sub-title: Rubeus the Heartless: The Tragic Sisters

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa learns that Usagi is Sailor Moon. Eager to return to the future, she steals Usagi's Silver Crystal and flees, only to be ambushed by Rubeus.
programme.sub-title: A UFO Appears: The Sailor Guardians Abducted

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rubeus succeeds in taking four of the five Sailor Guardians prisoner. He demands that Sailor Moon bring Chibi-Usa and the Silver Crystal to him.
programme.sub-title: Defeat Rubeus: The Battle in Space

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa falls into a coma. Usagi and the others are at a loss, when a Sailor Guardian calling herself Sailor Pluto suddenly appears before them.
programme.sub-title: The Mysterious New Guardian: Sailor Pluto Appears

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Black Moon clan sends down its next operative, Esmeraude, to open the Dark Gate in 20th century Tokyo.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi is still depressed over Mamoru calling off their relationship. Ami and Mako try to cheer her up by taking Usagi to a promise ring workshop.
programme.sub-title: Shared Feelings: Usagi and Mamoru in Love Once Again

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A strange new flu is causing everyone to get sick, including the Sailor Guardians. Minako takes it upon herself to look after her sick friends.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Artemis is out to prove he is capable after being teased by Luna. He encounters a suspicious-looking man who is gathering stray animals.
programme.sub-title: Artemis's Adventure: The Monster Animal Kingdom

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The school test results are posted, and Ami is at the top of her class. She finds herself becoming isolated after rumors that she cheated on the test.
programme.sub-title: The Terrifying Illusion: Ami All Alone

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: After being out sick, Chibi-Usa returns to school eager to see her friends. But to her surprise, her friends and teachers begin attacking her.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Gate Is Completed? The Targeted Elementary School

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa decides to return to save her mother. With support from the Sailor Guardians and Tuxedo Mask, she opens the Door of Space and Time.
programme.sub-title: Journey to the Future: Battle in the Space-Time Corridor

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Arriving in the future, the Sailor Guardians stand in shock as they see the ruins of what used to be Crystal Tokyo.
programme.sub-title: The Shocking Future: Dimande's Dark Ambition

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Tuxedo Mask rescues Sailor Moon from Black Moons castle. But before they can all celebrate, a giant dragon appears to destroy the Crystal Palace.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Wiseman brainwashes Chibi-Usa and turns her into the Dark Queen. The Sailor Guardians return to present-day Earth to find her.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Queen: Birth of Black Lady

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Saphir learns of Wisemans true intentions and tries to warn his brother, only to be attacked by Wiseman himself.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The appearance of the giant Malefic Black Crystal Tower is wreaking havoc. Sailor Moon and the Guardians enter the tower to put an end to this.
programme.sub-title: Believing in Love and the Future: Usagi's Decision

programme.title: Safe, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A young girl whose memory holds a priceless numerical code, finds herself pursued. Coming to her aid is an ex-cage fighter whose life was destroyed by the gangsters on Mei's trail.

programme.title: Redemption, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Joey, an alcoholic war veteran assumes a new identity after returning from a traumatic tour in Afghanistan and becomes a vigilante in a bid to atone for his sins.

programme.title: Transporter 3, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Mob courier Frank Martin and the subject of his assignment, a cynical Ukrainian woman, are fitted with shackles that will explode if they wander too far from his car.

programme.title: The Expendables, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A mercenary (Sylvester Stallone) and his men learn that their assignment to overthrow a South American dictator is a suicide mission.

programme.title: The Expendables 2, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Mercenary Barney Ross and his team cut a swath of destruction through opposing forces as they take revenge for the vicious murder of a comrade.

programme.title: The Expendables 3, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: After a former associate makes it his mission to end the Expendables, Barney Ross (Sylvester Stallone) assembles a team of younger, tech-savvy recruits to help take down their enemy.

programme.title: Safe, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A young girl whose memory holds a priceless numerical code, finds herself pursued. Coming to her aid is an ex-cage fighter whose life was destroyed by the gangsters on Mei's trail.

programme.title: Over the Top, (1987, Adventure)

Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Brad, Liotta, Pitt, Ray Diretor: Andrew Dominik

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: When alien invaders lay waste to planet Earth, its up to a select group of survivors to make a last-ditch stand. Fighting superior technology, mankinds best weapon is the will to survive. Starring Will Smith, Bill Pullman, Jeff Goldblum.

programme.title: Aliens
programme.desc: Ripley reawakens from cryogenic sleep a half-century after a narrow escape from her alien foe, only to be sent to a remote colony to help battle an infestation of Xenomorphs. Starring Sigourney Weaver, Carrie Henn, Michael Biehn.

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: With Meech MIA, Terry manages the business independently to keep the cash flowing and finds himself at odds as he seeks to exert more control over BMF.

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: Meech and Terry are focused on expanding their business; while Terry looks for a new connection in South Carolina, a new musical artist piques Meechs interest; Detective Bryant continues his pursuit of BMF.

programme.title: Born to Be Blue

programme.title: Maliglutit

programme.title: Fubar 2
programme.desc: Head bangers Terry (David Lawrence) and Dean (Paul J. Spence) are tired of barely scraping by and jump on an opportunity to go north and work on the pipelines during the holidays. Starring Dave Lawrence, Paul Spence, Gordon Skilling.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: FBI Agent Abby Corrigans life is endangered after she is suddenly attacked by an unfamiliar Abnormal during an investigation; Magnus and Wills heated debate over the best way to help Abby threatens to permanently alter their relationship.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: Magnus and Nikola Tesla get stuck in a virtual Sanctuary world at the mercy of the avatar of Adam Worth.

programme.title: Ozzy

programme.title: The Swan Princess and the Secret of the Castle

programme.desc: The golden retriever helps his young owner (Kevin Zegers) and his coed soccer team to shine while outsmarting a wily dogcatcher. Starring Kevin Zegers, Dale Midkiff, Caitlin Wachs.

programme.desc: Soccer-playing twins (Mary-Kate Olsen, Ashley Olsen) decide to help their father (Eric Lutes), a coach seeking a seventh championship title. Starring Mary-Kate Olsen, Ashley Olsen, Eric Lutes.

programme.desc: Love-struck garden gnomes (James McAvoy, Emily Blunt) become part of a feud between rival neighbors in Stratford-Upon-Avon, Shakespeares birthplace. Starring James McAvoy, Emily Blunt, Michael Caine.

programme.desc: An actual witch (Nicole Kidman) and a neurotic movie star (Will Ferrell) land the lead roles in a television remake of the 1960s sitcom. Starring Nicole Kidman, Will Ferrell, Shirley MacLaine.

programme.desc: Though broke and lovelorn, a woman (Kristen Wiig) takes on the strange and expensive rituals associated with being her best friends maid of honor. Starring Kristen Wiig, Maya Rudolph, Rose Byrne.

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: Meech and Terry find new inspiration in a rising RandB singer; together, they plan to launch a new record label; Terry hatches his own plan to regain control in St. Louis.

programme.desc: Meech and Terry continue to focus on Stomping Ground Records - and on their full-court press to sign Purdy; in St. Louis, things are getting tense as their business partner creates more rivals than friends.

programme.desc: A young man (Eric Balfour) and woman (Lauren Lee Smith) enjoy sexual compatibility but have trouble communicating and helping each other with problems. Starring Eric Balfour, Lauren Lee Smith, Don Francks.

programme.desc: A teens (Bella Thorne) life spirals out of control when she starts abusing painkillers and heroin with her new friends (Israel Broussard, Daniela Bobadilla) from school. Starring Bella Thorne, Israel Broussard, Daniela Bobadilla.

programme.title: Sanctuary

programme.title: Step Dogs
programme.desc: Meatball, a wise cracking country dog, and Cassie, Hollywoods most pampered pet, meet when their owners get married. The two fight constantly until burglars break into their house and they must team up to protect their home. Starring Dylan Schmid, Brittney Wilson, Eliana Jones.

programme.title: Clara
programme.desc: In a race to find intelligent life in the universe, an astronomer and his freethinking research assistant make an inexplicable discovery that changes how they see the world -- and each other. Starring Patrick J. Adams, Troian Bellisario, Kristen Hager.

programme.title: Matilda
programme.desc: A little girl develops extraordinary mental abilities, despite neglectful parents and a brutal headmistress. Starring Mara Wilson, Danny DeVito, Rhea Perlman.

programme.title: One Day in the Life of Noah Piugattuk
programme.desc: A government agent tries to get an Inuit man and his children to move to settlement housing. Starring Kim Bodnia, Apayata Kotierk, Benjamin Kunuk.

programme.title: Drink Slay Love
programme.desc: A 16-year old vampire discovers she has the ability to withstand sunlight. Sensing an opportunity to round up new victims, her family enrolls her in high school, where her who-cares attitude quickly makes her the coolest girl around. Starring Cierra Ramirez, Angelique Rivera, Gregg Sulkin.

programme.title: Puppy Swap: Love Unleashed

programme.title: Moonstruck

programme.title: The Vow
programme.desc: After his newlywed wife awakes from a coma, a man works to restore her lost memory and rebuild their marriage. Starring Rachel McAdams, Channing Tatum, Sam Neill.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The resourceful detective (Robert Downey Jr.) and his astute partner, Dr. Watson (Jude Law), meet a powerful criminal, a devotee of black magic who arises from his grave. Starring Robert Downey, Jude Law, Rachel McAdams.

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: Terrys attempts at gaining ground in St. Louis only result in more conflict, leading Meech to intervene; Lucille and Charles continue to navigate life living together following their divorce.

programme.title: Nurse Jackie
programme.desc: Akalitus forgets to hire an escort for a patient. Frank cancels his date with Jackie. Zoey overhears Coop and Carrie having sex. Jackie is worried about Frank.

programme.title: Nurse Jackie

programme.title: Weeds

programme.title: Weeds
programme.desc: A spontaneous date ends in near-violence for Nancy and Esteban; Silas tells Lisa he grows pot; Andy and Doug smuggle their first customer; Celia develops an addiction.

programme.title: The F Word
programme.desc: A medical-school dropout tries to hide his attraction to his new friend, a bubbly artist who already has a boyfriend. Starring Daniel Radcliffe, Zoe Kazan, Megan Park.

programme.title: Dont You Forget About Me
programme.desc: Four filmmakers travel to Illinois to find filmmaker John Hughes.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: The new Abnormal Homeland is in danger, forcing Helen Magnus into a corner; she has a plan that no one would suspect.

programme.title: Sanctuary

programme.title: Ballerina

programme.desc: Stuart the mouse and Snowball the cat journey through New York City to rescue a friend from a falcon. Starring Geena Davis, Hugh Laurie, Jonathan Lipnicki.

programme.title: The Mask

programme.title: Catwoman

When she inadvertently happens upon a secret her employer is hiding, she finds herself in the middle of a conspiracy. Starring Halle Berry, Benjamin Bratt, Sharon Stone.

programme.title: Spartacus: House of Ashur
programme.desc: Caesar demands a painful sacrifice from Ashur.

programme.title: Blood Quantum

Starring Michael Greyeyes, Elle-Maija Tailfeathers, Forrest Goodluck.

programme.title: Accidents Will Happen
programme.desc: An insurance man (Ronald Reagan) and a cigar-store girl (Gloria Blondell) stop a fake-claims ring featuring his wife. Starring Ronald Reagan, Gloria Blondell, Dick Purcell.

programme.title: Something Always Happens
programme.desc: An unemployed salesman (Ian Hunter) becomes successful after pitching an idea to a car factory. Starring Ian Hunter, Nancy ONeil, Peter Gawthorne.

programme.title: It Happened in Brooklyn

programme.title: It Happened on 5th Avenue
programme.desc: A hobo (Victor Moore) shares a New York mansion with a veteran (Don DeFore) and others who need a wintertime place to stay. Starring Don DeFore, Ann Harding, Victor Moore.

programme.title: What Ever Happened to Baby Jane?
programme.desc: A Hollywood child-star has-been (Bette Davis) torments her famous sister (Joan Crawford), now in a wheelchair. Starring Bette Davis, Joan Crawford, Victor Buono.

programme.title: It Happened at the Worlds Fair

programme.title: It May Happen to You
programme.desc: Mobsters convince an employee of a meat packing plant to steal a truckload of beef. Starring J. Carrol Naish.

programme.title: The Princess Bride
programme.desc: A storybook stableboy turns pirate (Cary Elwes) and rescues his beloved (Robin Wright), who is about to marry a dreadful prince. Starring Cary Elwes, Robin Wright, Mandy Patinkin.

programme.desc: James Lally admits that he has killed his partner Suzanne LaPierre; it takes more than confession for police to locate her body, leading authorities to a long interrogation with a character who seems more concerned with his own comfort.

programme.title: One Way Mirror
programme.desc: A messy divorce leads to a woman hiding a large sum of money with one of her close friends; when the woman goes missing, her friend, Ashley, is believed to be involved in more than just attempted fraud.

programme.title: One Way Mirror
programme.desc: After police discovers Melinda Pleskovic dead in her home just days before her daughters wedding, police turn to her future son-in-law when his story doesnt seem to add up; he has news of his own, break-ins at the Pleskovic home reveal the culprit.

programme.title: How Not to Hire a Hitman
programme.desc: New couple Leon and Valerie have one unfortunate thing in common, they both hate their exes. When Leons ex-wife and Valeries ex-husband are targeted for murder, it becomes a case of he said/she said. Who hired a hitman?

programme.desc: When a young FBI employee is found strangled to death in her own home, all signs point to her abusive ex -- until her diligent co-workers piece together the clues over several years to reveal that the killer is someone very unexpected.

Starring David Brook, Kane Cantell, Richard Harding.

programme.desc: Four years after a mother is found murdered on a deserted road, investigators link evidence to an air force base where a standardized testing scheme helps connect the murderer to the crime.

programme.desc: Friends are the family people choose, for better or worse.

programme.title: Twisted Dish - The Ultimate Herbed Steam in Bag Snapper
programme.desc: Learning to make fish and seafood with Master Chef Shular as he shares the fundamentals of cooking fish, infusing herbs and spices and perfecting the Steam in Bag technique.

programme.title: Twisted Dish - Everything Crusted Salmon And Salad One of Americas Favorite
programme.desc: Bland salmon is a thing of the past as chef Shular twists it into the flavored seasoned classic.

programme.title: Twisted Dish - Love that Cajun Fried Chicken from Shulars!
programme.desc: Master chef Shular fries up Cajun-seasoned buttermilk chicken.

programme.title: Twisted Dish - Cant Believe its Vegan! Carrot Dogs, Hummus Pizza and Fried Buffalo Cauliflower
programme.desc: Chef Shular shares techniques and tricks.

programme.title: Life of a King
programme.desc: Determined to help at-risk youths avoid the mistakes he made, an ex-con (Cuba Gooding Jr.) forms a chess club to offer them an alternative to running with street gangs.

programme.title: Shes Not Our Sister
programme.desc: After three sisters bury their father, family secrets are revealed that will alter their lives forever. But things really take a turn when a will is discovered that reveals that things are not as black and white as they thought them to be.

programme.title: Family Time - Its a Grey Area
programme.desc: Tony is upset when he discovers a grey hair and Lisa is amused.

programme.title: Family Time - The First Rule of Fight Night Is You Do Not Talk About Fight Night
programme.desc: Tony hosts fight night with his friends on the same night as Lisas dinner party.

programme.title: Family Time - The Will
programme.desc: Tony and Lisas family argue over who should take custody of their children if something happens to them.

programme.title: Family Time - No New Friends
programme.desc: When an old friend of Tonys moves into the neighborhood, the Stallworths realize things arent exactly as they seem.

programme.title: Family Time - Hospitality
programme.desc: Lisa invites Tonys godparents to stay for a few nights but no one can get them to leave.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - The Music Mac
programme.desc: When Vanessa surprises everyone with her musical talent, Isaac Hayes offers Bernie advice on how to nurture it.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Walk Like a Man
programme.desc: Bernie sees children walking to school on their own and decides it is time for Jordan to do the same, despite Wandas objections.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Father Knows Best
programme.desc: When a man arrives from Chicago claiming to be Bryanas father, Bernie is cautiously supportive.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Wrestling With a Sticky Situation
programme.desc: When Jordan joins the wrestling team, he overeats and finds himself in a weight class in which he is outmatched.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Marathon Mac
programme.desc: When Bernie agrees to participate in a celebrity marathon, Vanessa declares that she will finish the race ahead of him.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - My Whole Left Side
programme.desc: Lovita (Terri J. Vaughn) welcomes the opportunity to impress Cedrics (Cedric The Entertainer) beloved Grandma Puddin.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - My Two Big Daddies
programme.desc: Posing as a single father, Steve (Steve Harvey) uses young Romeo (Merlin Santana) to rope in an attractive single mother (guest star Alex Datcher).

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Boomerang
programme.desc: Steve (Steve Harvey) becomes a fool for love when he falls for Reginas (Wendy Raquel Robinson) friend (guest star Roxanne Beckford). With William Lee Scott.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - All About Steve
programme.desc: A power-hungry Steve fills in for Regina as acting principal for a few days; Cedric and Lovita disagree about their wedding day.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - And Injustice for All
programme.desc: Steve (Steve Harvey) faces a judge (guest star Arnetia Walker) when Lovita (Terri J. Vaughn) takes him to court after he sells her a broken TV set.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Educating Piggy
programme.desc: Steve and Cedric (Steve Harvey, Cedric The Entertainer) have to take a computer course taught by Lovita (Terri J. Vaughn).

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Welcome to Bernies
programme.desc: Steve, Cedric, Lovita and Regina (Steve Harvey, Cedric The Entertainer, Terri J. Vaughn, Wendy Raquel Robinson) attend a seminar on faculty relationships.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - What You Wont Cue for Love
programme.desc: Steve and Cedric (Steve Harvey, Cedric The Entertainer) take on Regina and Lovita (Wendy Raquel Robinson, Terri J. Vaughn) in a pool tournament.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Rent
programme.desc: Steve (Steve Harvey) falls for an IRS agent (guest star Vanessa Williams) who suspects that Cedric (Cedric The Entertainer) is committing tax fraud.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Everybody Loves Regina
programme.desc: Regina (Wendy Raquel Robinson) goes out of her way to prove to Steve (Steve Harvey) that she still has some song and dance in her system. Singer Busta Rhymes guest stars.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Every Boy Needs a Teacher
programme.desc: A strange double date results after Steve and Regina (Steve Harvey, Wendy Raquel Robinson) both find new romances with unlikely people.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Lovita Doesnt Live Here Anymore
programme.desc: Lovita (Terri J. Vaughn) walks out on her mother but doesnt find a big welcome from Cedric, Steve and Regina (Cedric The Entertainer, Steve Harvey, Wendy Raquel Robinson).
